name: Firefighting Simulator SteamVR
description:
A VR firefighting simulator I made over the course of three days for a class called Special Topic in IT - Immersive Technologies. Created with Unity and using the SteamVR plugin.

Players must put out all of the fire on the house as well as rush into the smoky house and rescue a civilian.

Controls on Vive:

Press trackpad to teleport

Triggers to pick up objects

Side bumpers, triggers, and trackpads for finger movement
